result.arabic_text: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى
result.translation: (129) And if not for a word[866] that preceded from your Lord, it [i.e., punishment] would have been an obligation [due immediately],[867] and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
result.footnotes:
[866]- See footnote to 10:19.
[867]- Allāh would have punished the disbelievers in this world as He did with previous peoples.
